title: The Dancing Fool
text:
The Dancing Fool is a 1932 <a href="Fleischer%20Studios">Fleischer Studios</a> <a href="Talkartoon">Talkartoon</a> <a href="animated%20short">animated short</a> film starring <a href="Betty%20Boop">Betty Boop</a>, Bimbo, and <a href="Koko%20the%20Clown">Koko the Clown</a>.
Synopsis.
Bimbo and Koko are sign painters hired to paint the lettering on the window of "Betty Boop's Dancing School". Betty Boop teaches her animal friends how to dance to the tune of "Dancing to Save Your Soul". The dancing shakes the building, which crumbles to the ground.
